long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform the way you share links with our user-friendly URL Shortener extension! Whether you're sharing content on social media, in emails, or anywhere else, this extension provides a seamless way to shorten long URLs quickly and efficiently.

Key Features: ⚡
🔷Instant URL Shortening: With just a click, you can shorten the current webpage URL, making it easier to share and manage links.

🔷Custom URL Input: Want to shorten a specific URL? Enter it directly into the input field and generate a shortened link in seconds!

🔷QR Code Generation: After shortening a URL, a QR code is generated automatically, making it simple to share links in print or digital formats.

🔷Dark Mode Support: Toggle between light and dark modes to suit your browsing preference and enhance your viewing experience.

🔷Donation Support: Enjoy using the extension? Consider supporting the developer with a “Buy Me a Coffee” button, helping to keep the extension free and continuously improved.

🔷User-Friendly Interface: Designed with simplicity in mind, the extension features an intuitive layout with easy-to-navigate buttons and input fields.

How to Use: 🎯
Click the "Shorten Current Page" button to quickly shorten the URL of the page you are currently viewing.
Alternatively, enter any URL in the provided input field and click "Shorten URL."
After the URL is shortened, a success message and QR code will be displayed, ready for sharing!

Why Choose Our Extension? 🤔
In a digital world where link management is essential, our URL Shortener extension stands out with its ease of use and additional features like QR code generation. It’s perfect for social media enthusiasts, marketers, or anyone looking to streamline their link-sharing process.

Download the extension today and make sharing links a breeze! 😉
